Courses We Offer

We offer a plethora courses that are constantly updated to meet modern curriculum

Software Engineering

The increasing demand for software applications in transportation, finance, health, education and other critical sectors of the global economy cannot be overemphasized because of the huge benefits of computerization. Fortunately, the concept of applying an engineering approach to software development provided a solution to the software crisis noticed overtime.

Cyber Security

The department of Cybersecurity being a neophyte in the university was created because of the need for protecting the cyberspace at all times. The cyberspace has become a critical infrastructure for most countries because of the internet and cloud computing applications.

Data Science

The department of Data Science is particularly known for its quest for advancement in technology with a unique focus on practical training of undergraduate and graduate students in the area of Data Science and Analysis. The Department promotes constant interaction with relevant industry partners and organizes workshops and seminars to help both staff and students keep abreast with the realities of our times.

Our Facilities

The University campus is an ultra-modern new generation campus.

World Class Library

The University Library is endowed with a team of qualified professional, support and technical staff and state-of-the-art facilities, the University Library continues to provide excellent, resourceful and user-oriented services to her user community.

Amazing Sport Facilities

There are multiple sport facilities to keep our students engaged and physically fit.

Conducive Learning Environment

The learning theatre is air-conditioned with modern lighting facilities, full multimedia teaching and learning facilities.
